document_data.name: Eaerith Talor
document_data.mainbody: '''Eaerith Talor''' was a [[warlock]] active in [[Athkatla]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/417/Eye on the Realms: The Sword of Spells}}
document_data.Description: Eaerith was a graceful and handsome man, who regularly pretended to be a woman in order to access the parties held by local nobility or wealthy individuals. Going by the sobriquet "''[[Luthlund]] of [[Luskan]]''", he relied on those events to find patrons to sponsor his adventures.
document_data.History: Sometime between the {{yearlinkName|1449}} and the {{yearlinkName|1454}}, Eaerith suffered an attack from the [[Sword of Savras]] and consequently lost access to his pact magic. He however retained the ability to wield magic items.
